column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque can hold their own with the best of them
column2: and I'm not talking Chicago bbq standards.  These people are making bbq RIGHT
column3: Mason Dixon line be damned.  The very best ribs I've ever had in Chicago and
column5: some of the best I've had anywhere
column6: period.  I got the combo baby back/St. Louis and
column8: definitely favor the St. Louis style. The brisket...oh...perfect pink smoke ring
column10: tender juicy meat.  There isn't a brisket in town that can top it.  The Texas Link IS a Texas Link.  Holy moly
column11: I thought I was at some German smokehouse in Texas when I ate that thing - beautifully marbled with fat
column14: and a natural casing that gives it a fantastic snap. I'm a happy girl.
